statements.select: SELECT acr.AcbeginbillReceivableDetailId,acr.AcbeginbillReceivableId, cus.CustomerId,acr.AdvanceCollection,acr.ShouldCollection,acr.DomesticAdvanceCollection, acr.DomesticShouldCollection,acr.AlreadyCollection,acr.DomesticAlreadyCollection,acr.BeginningBalance ,acr.DomesticBeginningBalance FROM Customer cus LEFT JOIN AcbeginbillReceivableDetail acr ON 1!=1
